"Gateway Worship" in the last few years brought some great praise productions onto the market. Now there is also a German compilation of the most successful songs. Anja Lehmann, Klaus KÃƒÂ¼hn and Yuri Friezes sing the German versions of "Overtaken", "No sweeter name", "Alabaster Jar" and many more. The sytlistic "gateway classic sound" remains naturally preserved. Content of the songs should all fit very well into the German worship songs folder. All in all, a strong combination of passionate vocals, strong content and classic "modern worship" sound garment.
